txt.en: The Orcs of Moria have poured out into Fanuidhol, mustering for an assault upon the Golden Wood.

'Bahanneth sent you, [placeholder]? He is correct...if we are to fully prepare for the war ahead, we must know what numbers are arrayed against us. I have a task for you, if you wish to aid us.

'Journey north and west into Fanuidhol and scout the four northernmost encampments. There is a lumber camp called Drûmaudhul which lies west and a little to the north of here. Bidroi Maudhul can be found to the north of Drûmaudhul, as can Prakûth-fulug. Nardur-stazg lies to the north-west of Bidroi Maudhul and is one of the strongest encampments in Fanuidhol.

'Scout each of the encampments, then return to me. I will reward you as I may, but expect a greater reward from Bahanneth.'

<rgb=#FF0000>Note: While Fanuidhol Defence is active, Raingon will not be available for quest completion or comments. You will have to wait for Fanuidhol Defence to end to complete this quest.</rgb>

Drûmaudhul, Prakûth-fulug, Bidroi Maudhul, and Nardur-stazg all lie to the north-west of Talan Gwilith.

Raingon has asked you to scout four Orc-encampments in Fanuidhol to determine their strength: Drûmaudhul. Prakûth-fulug, Bidroi Maudhul, and Nardur-stazg.

<rgb=#FF0000>Note: While Fanuidhol Defence is active, Raingon will not be available for quest completion or comments. You will have to wait for Fanuidhol Defence to end to complete this quest.</rgb>

'You have completed your patrol? Ah! Drûmaudhul is a strong encampment and supplies the Orcs with wood for their siege-engines, and Nardur-stazg is their chief encampment.\n\n'You should return to Bahanneth at once with this news.'

Raingon is at Talan Gwilith, south-east of Fanuidhol.

You should return to Raingon with your report.

<rgb=#FF0000>Note: While Fanuidhol Defence is active, Raingon will not be available for quest completion or comments. You will have to wait for Fanuidhol Defence to end to complete this quest.</rgb>

'What have you found thus far? That is not much...I need you to scout all four encampments: Drûmaudhul, Bidroi Maudhul, Prakûth-fulug, and Nardur-stazg.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Note: While Fanuidhol Defence is active, Raingon will not be available for quest completion or comments. You will have to wait for Fanuidhol Defence to end to complete this quest.</rgb>
Talk to Raingon at Talan Gwilith
